csw.services.location.commons

Class CswCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • csw.services.location.commons.CswCluster

  • public class CswCluster
extends java.lang.Object
    CswCluster provides cluster properties to manage distributed data. It is created when location service instance is created in csw-framework and joins the cluster.
